m_displayName: STORY MODE - LIVRE I - Chapitre 34 - Absorption shushu

description.fr:
<rem><color=#EEBB44>Atteindre {value:p} Points pour remporter le combat.\vVaincre des adversaires rapporte des points.</color></rem>
\---
Quand un {Summoning:467,plural:one} apparaît\_: Confère un bonus de {%PVMAX} et d'{%AT} à un {%FAMILY_SHUSHU_NAME,plural:one} autour\_<sprite name="cell_around"> de lui, puis le sacrifie.
description.en:
<rem><color=#EEBB44>Reach {value:p} Points to win the fight.\vDefeating opponents earns points.</color></rem>
\---
When a {Summoning:467,plural:one} appears: Confers a {%PVMAX} and {%AT} bonus on a surrounding\_<sprite name="cell_around"> {%FAMILY_SHUSHU_NAME,plural:one}, then sacrifices it.
description.es:
<rem><color=#EEBB44>Alcanzar {value:p} puntos para ganar el combate.\vVencer adversarios genera puntos.</color></rem>
\---
Cuando aparece un {Summoning:467,plural:one}: Confiere un bonus de {%PVMAX} y de {%AT} a un {%FAMILY_SHUSHU_NAME,plural:one} a su alrededor\_<sprite name="cell_around"> y lo sacrifica.
description.de:
<rem><color=#EEBB44>Erreiche {value:p}\_Punkte, um den Kampf zu gewinnen.\vBesiege Gegner, um Punkte zu erhalten.</color></rem>
\---
Wenn ein\_{Summoning:467,plural:one} erscheint: Gewährt einem\_{%FAMILY_SHUSHU_NAME,plural:one} im Umkreis\_<sprite name="cell_around"> einen {%PVMAX}- und {%AT,plural:two}-Bonus und opfert ihn dann.
description.pt:
<rem><color=#EEBB44>Alcançar {value:p} pontos para vencer o combate.\vDerrotar adversários rende pontos.</color></rem>
\---
Quando um {Summoning:467,plural:one} aparece: Concede um bônus de {%PVMAX} e de {%AT} a um {%FAMILY_SHUSHU_NAME,plural:one} em\_volta\_<sprite name="cell_around"> dele, depois o sacrifica.
